<@!381789485777682434> I added the group check in G1 and G2 into  `wasmcurves` . https://github.com/iden3/wasmcurves/blob/185d216caaa49edd45d1a4e280b3072fa58c0c7f/src/bls12381/build_bls12381.js#L1393
Please, take in account that the lates version is in `wasmcurves` .  (`wasmsnark`  is deprecated as it's inegrated in snarkjs and all the wasm code is maintained in `wasmcurves` repo).  
I used this paper to do the check the group in G1 and G2: https://eprint.iacr.org/2019/814.pdf
I've not benchmark it, But I believe it should not affact too much compared to the pairing calculation.
